content:
Update: Problem dissolved. But I'd still like to know where the email draft went.

After searching for it (above), I exited and restarted TB. It asked if it should send my unsent messages. Woot!

But TB couldn't send through the account's smtp server. It kept timing out. Not clear if TB did something funny or the server just happened to become unavailable.

Getting back to it after a couple of hours, when I told it to send the unsent messages the draft went out.

I'd still like to know where TB hides those drafts.
creator: Toolworker
